---
title: TIREE
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: tiree
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $11.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with TIREE. The average
  contract duration was 1.53 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $686.3K.
  The longest contract was 6 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $17.4M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '11.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '181'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '94'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '52%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '125%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.02'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '30.8M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.53'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '686.3K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '6'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '17.4M'
---
